hero.title: Transform Your Kitchen Into a Culinary Studio
hero.subtitle: Recipe AI uses advanced computer vision to analyze photos of your refrigerator or ingredients, instantly creating personalized recipes you'll love.
hero.description: Upload your food delivery history, and our AI will design healthier, homemade versions of your favorite restaurant meals. In a world where quality delivery food is often too expensive and budget options lack nutrition, Recipe AI helps you cook delicious, nutritious meals at home.

snapAndCook.title: Snap & Cook
snapAndCook.description: Our cutting-edge computer vision instantly recognizes ingredients in your refrigerator photos, transforming random items into delicious meals you never thought possible.

deliveryHistory.title: Delivery History Analysis
deliveryHistory.description: Upload your UberEats or food delivery history, and our AI creates healthier, budget-friendly homemade versions of your favorite restaurant meals that taste just as good.

nutritionalIntelligence.title: Nutritional Intelligence
nutritionalIntelligence.description: Our AI balances taste with nutrition, creating recipes that are both delicious and healthy. Break free from expensive delivery food and cook nutritious meals at home.

step1.title: Upload Photos
step1.description: Take photos of your ingredients or refrigerator contents

step2.title: AI Analysis
step2.description: Our AI identifies ingredients and considers your preferences

step3.title: Recipe Generation
step3.description: Get personalized recipes based on your ingredients and taste

step4.title: Cook & Enjoy
step4.description: Follow the recipe and enjoy your delicious meal

testimonial1.name: Jessica T.
testimonial1.quote: Recipe AI has transformed how I cook. I've cut my food delivery spending by 70% and now make restaurant-quality meals at home with whatever ingredients I have in my fridge!

testimonial2.name: Michael R.
testimonial2.quote: I used to spend a fortune on food delivery that was either expensive and good or cheap and unhealthy. Recipe AI analyzes my UberEats history and creates healthier versions I can make at home in less time than delivery takes!

testimonial3.name: Sarah K.
testimonial3.quote: The AI vision technology is incredible - I just snap a photo of my refrigerator and it identifies everything inside, suggesting creative recipes I'd never think of. I'm eating healthier and saving money by cooking at home instead of ordering out.

tryItNow.title: Try Recipe AI Now

tryItNow.noIngredientsIdentified: No ingredients were identified. Try uploading a clearer image.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introductionText: Recipe AI ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share information about you when you use our services.
privacyPolicy.informationWeCollectText: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, upload photos, or interact with our services. This may include:
privacyPolicy.howWeUseYourInformationText: We use the information we collect to:
useItems: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Analyze your preferences to enhance your experience
Communicate with you about our services
privacyPolicy.dataRetentionText: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. You can delete your account at any time.
privacyPolicy.contactUsText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@recipeai.com.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.acceptanceOfTermsText: By accessing or using Recipe AI, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.
termsOfService.userAccountsText: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account.
termsOfService.userContentText: You retain ownership of any content you upload to Recipe AI. By uploading content, you grant us a license to use, store, and share that content as necessary to provide our services.
prohibitedItems: Use our services for any illegal purpose
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
Interfere with other users' enjoyment of our services
termsOfService.terminationText: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at our sole discretion, without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms of Service or is harmful to other users of our services, us, or third parties, or for any other reason.
termsOfService.contactUsText: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at terms@recipeai.com.
